projects.name: Crowded Lands
projects.role: Front end developer and web designer
projects.description: Crowded Lands visualizes the population density of every country in the world. Enter a country's name, and experience the visual representation of its population density per square mile.

projects.name: The Mirror Paradox
projects.role: Front end developer and web designer
projects.description: The Mirror Paradox reflects a user's willingness to put a price tag on their future.

projects.name: Live Discourse
projects.description: Live Discourse is a real-time chat application that promotes live, ongoing debate and conversation with readers all over the world. It is connected to a discussion meter which allows users to gauge the allure of an article based on the amount of messages exchanged.

projects.name: Proton Playground
projects.description: Proton Playground has made the periodic table of the chemical elements fun again. Simply click on a chemical element, watch its protons come to life, and play with them.
